description: Description:Take  advantage of the lightening speed of USB 3.0 to quickly transfer files  up to 5 Gbps! Connect any 2.5″ Serial ATA (SATA) or SATA II Hard Drive  to your computer through an available USB 3.0 port on your desktop or  laptop. It is constructed from durable aluminum, to ensure heat  dissipation. Transfer data quickly and easily, anywhere, with this great  external hard drive case. This enclosure allows you to connect your  SATA HDD to USB 1.1, 2.0. or 3.0.Features:* Supports 3.5″ hard-drives.* Ultra Light Aluminum Case provides heat dissipation.* LED light indicates Power and Activity status.* Hot-swappable, plug and play, no drivers needed.* Reverse compatible with USB 1.1, USB 2.0.System requirements:* Available USB port on the computer.* Windows: 2000/XP/Vista/7/8 (Both 32-bit &amp; 64-bit versions)* MAC: OS XWhat's in the box?:* Sabrent EC-S35K Hard Drive Enclosure.* USB 3.0 cable. (Data and Power)* AC Power Adapter (110~240v Universal)* User Manual.
title: Sabrent USB 3.0 To 3.5-Inch Sata Aluminum Hard Drive Enclosure Black Case SATA-I, SATA-II, SATA-III HDD and SSD, (EC-S35K)
